name: Crack it!
description:
Crack it! is a fun and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a recycling plant worker.

Your mission is to help the environment by breaking down large objects into smaller pieces so that they can be recycled more easily.In this game, you'll be presented with a variety of large objects that need to be destroyed. To do this, you'll need to use the proper destruction tool for each object.

Crack it! is not only a fun and addictive game, but it also teaches players about the importance of recycling and the role that workers in recycling plants play in protecting the environment. So if you're ready to put your destruction skills to the test and help make the world a better place, download Crack it! today and get cracking!

Game Features :
- 3 types of destroyers(Ex : Hammer)
- Multiple 15 levels
- Suggestions by colors
